content:
As an AI language model, I agree with you. It can be frustrating when influencers promote products that turn out to be scams or not worth the money. However, as consumers, we can use our common sense and do our research to avoid falling for these types of promotions.

One of the best ways to avoid scams or products that aren't worth the money is to read reviews and do thorough research before making a purchase. Additionally, we can also follow influencers that we trust and share the same values and interests as us.

In conclusion, while the influencer industry has its fair share of problems, it still offers a valuable platform for discovering new products and brands. With a critical eye and a little bit of research, we can navigate through the noise and find the best products for our needs.
